sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description/>
        <name>query making</name>
        <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var arr = ["HCC SG", "HCC AU", "HCC JG"];

var child = [];
for (var i in arr) {
    var typeQuery = 'typeLIKE';
    var typeQuery2 = '^ORtypeLIKE';
    child.push(typeQuery + arr[i] + typeQuery2 + arr[i]);
}

gs.info(child);
child = child.toString().split('^');
var  first = child[0];
gs.info('First element' + child[0]);
child = child.splice(2); // Remove user 
gs.info('remaining element' + child );

var arr1 = child;
gs.info(arr1.toString());

]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2024-05-11 19:28:45</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>20501ee693860210b31a30dcebba1090</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>query making</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_20501ee693860210b31a30dcebba1090</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2024-05-11 19:38:12</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
